name: SAKIORI Three NOREN 80 x 118 cm deep purple
description:
Details of Art work. Didital photography of  traditional Japanese textile "SAKIORI"
made this textile tapestry on the wall. it's artistic traditional Japanese technique with large handmade machine. 

 it's called "SAKIORI"

Tear the traditional used kimono into a string, then made with weaving machine uses hands and legs. I think it is SDGs, ethical, ecological and sustainable. 

"NOREN" is a Japanese curtain for the separation of spiritual space. For example , Japanese public spa "SENTO", or Entrance of sushi restaurant.
